council_profile.name: Preston City Council
council_profile.covers: Preston city in central Lancashire — the administrative centre of Lancashire
notable_issues: Lancashire county town and administrative centre
Preston Model — internationally recognised community wealth building approach
University of Central Lancashire (UCLan) campus — major employer and economic anchor

Year-end spending spike of 10.6x in REV CUSTOMER SERVICES

data_quality.transparency_notes: Preston City Council publishes spending data over £500.

cross_council_context.note: Preston City Council is a district council in Lancashire. Comparable to other Lancashire district councils.
